patterns: Will I need a laptop while coming to college?
responses: No,in starting you wouldn't require a laptop and can buy it here only around diwali, when a lot of offers are going around.
context: There is no default platform. It depends on the professor which platform he is willing to use.

patterns: Where will online classes be conducted for 1st year students?
responses: There is no default platform. It depends on the professor which platform he is willing to use.

patterns: Is there any official website operated by IIT mandi where i can get every information about assignment,schedule of quizzes and classes,and list of courses?
responses: Yes, there is a website operated by IIT mandi named 'moodle' where you get every information about assignment, quizzes and courses.Moodle:-https://students.iitmandi.ac.in/moodle/

patterns: As there are many clubs in IIT mandi,i'm facing problems in tracking all activities and sessions of all clubs. Is there any website which contain all information about schedule of clubs?
responses: Yes,you can keep track of all activities and sessions of every club up to dated on: https://activities.iitmandi.co.in/

patterns: What are the places of hangout nearby the campus? Do we have malls and theatres?
responses: Sorry, but if you are city person, this isn't place for you. But if you are natural lover, you will not find a better placce than this.

patterns: Since this is a college on mountains, do we have planned treks and how often do we get that?
responses: We have clubs for trekking activities and they organise trips regularly, around twice a month.

patterns: What is Chess tournament platform of IIT Mandi?
responses: Lichess

patterns: How many gpa is needed for semester exchange programme?
responses: Itâ€™s a relative case depends on your batchmates

patterns: Most famous game of IIT Mandi?
responses: Badminton and volleyball are favourites among student other than cricket, footaball and table tennis

patterns: If I Got less grade points than will there be change in my branch from CS to other?
responses: Yes

patterns: Can we use induction in rooms of IIT Mandi ?
responses: Each floor of every hostel is equipped with basic things like iron, inductoin, microwave
